<<<<<<< HEAD
A straunge foot-post vvith a packet full of strange petitions. After a long vacation for a good terme. Nixon, Anthony.
[52] p.
By E[dward] A[llde] dwelling neare Christ-Church, Printed at London : 1613.
"To the reader" signed: Anthony Nixon. With a title-page woodcut. Printer's name from STC. Signatures: A² B-G⁴. Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======
